name: Dark Town: Invisible Danger
description:
Real story which happened at a village in Mugla, Turkey at 1986. Some villagers made deals with the devil for find treasure. After that day, nothing happened like old times.

After these incidents villagers left the village. But devils still protecting the treasure. You want this treasure because your character is greedy and you are moving to this village.

This incident happened at Kibletepe village. Out target is find the treasure and take it. You need to collect hints and move throught them for find the treasure. You need to finish your missions and run away from devil souls in a limited time.

Do you really want this treasure ?
